title: Preseason 2020 Gameplay: Rise of the Elements

replies.body: Thank you, league of legends.
You're welcome! This has been an incredibly fun project to work on and we simply can't wait until you all get to experience it too.

So a lot of players said they dont like drag RNG, so you added map RNG?

Edit: I dont mean to be all negative, some of the changes (like removing shojin) are really good, this just made no sense to me

Ok, but this RNG will never favor a particular team or comp in any major way, they just make the game feel less stagnant. A team isn't going to win or really have an advantage because there are walls somewhere there didn't use to be.
We'll see if you still believe that after you face a rengar, when the rng map decides to give him extra bushes from ocean drag.
Laughs in Qiyana
Can we get some better MR items Riot
Yes I agree, currently there is not a very good way to stop AP damage from mages. MR items are lacking for sure.
SHOJIN IS GONE PRAISE

shojin isn't gone, it's placed onto the cloud drake, after a team kills their 4th drake (20 mins into game) and the cloud drake dominates all other drakes (ex. 2 cloud, 1 ocean, 1 mtn or 3 cloud, 1 ocean) the entire team will have a shojin effect which last until the end of the game

this will make cloud drakes more important than infernals cuz extra cdr on ult and abilities means champs like jax and fiora will always be broken
i think its if someone gets 4 dragon buffs of the same element itll drop a single orb for a champ to pick up and have the effect lol
Well no, it states that it affects the whole team. Meaning that it's a free spear of shojin to the whole entire team
Youre decreasing jg xp again? Are you serious? When a top laner wins theyre already 3 levels ahead of everyone. When a jg wins they barely match top in levels
Yes the Gromp = Krugs change is amazing. But overall jg xp is getting nerfed, again. After they already nerfed it at the start of season 9...
lmao currently a standard Jungle path ends in level 4 for Jungler and 6 for Mid Lane. Looking forward to the 3~ish to almost or actually 7 disparity.
Lowering Jungle XP will make junglers so weak. It already is not enough xp compared to solo lanes. Riot you already tried lowering jungler xp a few seasons ago. It did not work.
I don't know how the Elder Dragon change is in any way balanced, but ok.

I think Riot is trying to cut games shorter by threatening winning teams to end early, but what is going to happen to late game champions? This is going to turn into another assassin meta, which was never fun to play with.

The possibility for double herald is a change I like because it shifts early game focus from around bot lane for dragon to all over the map. This is a good change, which also makes the game more early game dependent. 

Just my two cents.
Lol what a knee jerk reaction post. Elder dragon doesn't spawn until 35 minutes. How about you wait until you can actually play the changes before acting like the world is ending?
If you're winning, go for elder, and it becomes a 50/50, you've misplayed.

Making more routes viable, thereby encouraging more playstyles and innovative fun scares away players from learning jungle? Routes being more versatile can also reduce staleness of the game through different ideas even if sticking to the same champion.
you clearly don't play jungle

These are interesting map changes and probably good for the game. However, it will become even more difficult to play a low mobility champion. 

More bushes = less vision and more deaths even when trying to enter your own jungle. There have to be some "safe paths" so you don't feel like you're forced to gamble almost regardless of where you walk.

Okay, let us put the blame on Conqueror's true damage, and ignore the fact mages are the ones obliterating tanks top... Also, a lot of these changes feel forced, and just here for the sake of change only. One last thing, how is all you mentioned going to make top lane more impactful in a healthy way? I am all for my lane having more impact, but top and mid laners being even higher xp than duo laners feels unfair and unfun to adc players...
oh boy, more jungle XP nerfs without decreasing camp respawn time, because that doesn't *literally encourage a permagank camp meta that nobody likes*
These changes look beautiful graphically and look awesome mechanically, thank you Riot Games for keeping things fresh, can't wait to try out these changes!
Thank you for gracing this thread with some positivity! Too many negative Nancys
Yeah this is cool and all but wheres the voice com's.  And don't be telling me that you already have it cuz you don't.  Pre qeue voice com's is a meme.

I'm one of the people who would permanently opt out of that feature. I've already had way too many people tell me to kill myself/fantasize about abusing my mother in text. Don't need to hear it in voice, lmao.
i like the support changes
So after the Tier 3 passive on the support items how are support players supposed to earn money if we aren't supposed to farm minions and you're removing the gold generation passive?
u still get procs generation is the bonus extra gold

I think you are correct, but I would definitely like some clarification on the point. Having to rely solely on gp5 and objectives for income in the mid and late game as a support would be a huge step backwards in support quality of life.

There's honestly already too much damage in this game and now with these changes, damage is going through the roof. In fact, now late game champions seem irrelevant and unplayable because if you play a late game champion your team will not be able to get priority on dragons: and this season emphasizes on that importance. Honestly think damage needs to be reduced because as of now theres too much and little place for late game champions.
Are dragon spawns being shown in Champ Select to reduce RNG?
Finally... Worth playing the preseason
Honestly can't wait till you get to play it. Not long now!
what about ohmwrecker? {{item:3056}}
Don't remind them, I build this thing once per season or so and it's sleeper OP in games when I'm so ahead I can afford to troll and buy it.

So..... Players hate RNG, you add more to the game by changing the map itself?
Players hate playing support so you remove support gold generation and make it even harder to play support by removing coin?
Players hate playing support and ADC because of the changes to the game that removed their agency in the game.... So you reduce the experience in bot lane to make this problem even worse.
Players hate the excessive damage in the game and loathe executes so you add an execute to everyone with Elder Dragon.
Players continually ask for less auto-killing on them so you make assassins even more diverse, including giving them a spellshield with no penalty (many assassins are already way too safe to begin with) or making an item that goes so well with Kha'Zix that we know he will need to be perma-banned.

Oh yeah.. That video about how players used to leave after Urf until you found out that keeping Urf around for a long time made it better? So 12 days..... Yeah... It really seems like this is just Riot saying "We hear everything you say and do the opposite because we hate you."

Also... You are removing Spear of Shojin because the effect is blatantly broken.. And adding said effect (except enhanced from the sounds of it) to the Cloud Soul. Ummm....? Do you notice a trend here?

Almost the whole thing sounds atrocious to be honest.

Oh yeah.. I forgot to mention that players hate being ganked every 45 seconds as well... so you nerf the JG experience even more to make it more likely to be ganked.

This also causes a lot of JGs to go into lanes and steal or leech experience and minions, causing toxicity on teams.

Yeah.... excellent.
Are dragon spawns going to be visible in champ select with their even higher impact on the game now. If not it could turn pro play into a RNG fest.
The changes to the solo laner XP and botlane XP are so stupid, solo laners are already so much better than ADCs why make them even stronger I hope that isn’t finalized I think it’s stupid

Agreed. I'm failing to understand why they nerfed the bot lane? I'm seeing stupid things like tanks just walking up and killing the carries without any problems. On top of that they add more tools to kill ADCs with more lethality items. 
The real problem is that assassins can build like a bruiser and still one shot the fed ADC. 
Its already bad enough that top and mid always out level bot by 2 levels on average.

increasing solo lanes xp while reducing bot lane. WTF!! solo laners are lvl 6 when my supp and I are still lvl 4 and now its going to be even worse holy shit who makes these dumb unneeded changes. cloud drake lowers ult cdr nice! now lux has ult every 15 seconds and zoe has ult every 3 seconds. every season adc gets worse and top mid supp keep getting buffed thats so crazy
I dont think Zoe's ult is what makes her annoying...
Ok I really like these changes, but why are you taking away xp from duo lanes? Bot laners and supports already suffer a level disadvantage throughout almost the entire game.
